body_html: @jbencook as I mentioned , convolutional.py seems to run correctly, but after like 15 minutes it crashes due to out of memory, but the output looks correct and I used nvidia-smi's tool to verify that it's actually running on the GPU and it is. I suspect that this is because the batch size ... i know that the gpus on ec2 don't have that much memory, but I'm really unsure at this moment why it ran out of memory
